name: Ahmed Shenawy
title: Senior Roaming & Core Network Specialist
summary: Telecommunications expert specializing in mobile core networks and roaming services, with a passion for blockchain and Web3 technologies. Dedicated to optimizing network solutions and exploring innovative decentralized systems.
professionalBackground: Experienced telecommunications professional with deep expertise in mobile core networks, roaming services, and emerging technologies. My career spans the evolution of mobile networks from 2G to 5G, with specialized knowledge in VoLTE, IMS, and roaming implementations. I have successfully architected and optimized mobile network solutions across multiple generations of technology, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance. Additionally, I am actively engaged in blockchain technology, developing innovative solutions and exploring the potential of Web3 and decentralized systems.
